title: Login issue
description: Customer unable to log into the portal using valid credentials.

title: Payment failed
description: Transaction not processed but amount deducted from customer’s bank account.

title: Slow website
description: Customer reports the website is taking too long to load on mobile devices.

title: Password reset not working
description: Reset link sent via email is expired immediately after receiving.

title: App crash
description: Mobile app crashes on startup after latest update.

title: Order not delivered
description: Customer placed order 10 days ago but still hasn’t received the product.

title: Email notifications not received
description: Customer is not receiving confirmation or promotional emails.

title: Refund not processed
description: Customer requested a refund 2 weeks ago but amount not credited yet.

title: Feature request
description: Customer suggests adding dark mode support to the application.

title: Bug in checkout
description: Checkout button remains disabled even after entering valid details.

title: Profile picture upload error
description: Customer unable to upload new profile photo. Error 500 returned.

title: Coupon code not applying
description: Discount coupon entered but no reduction in final price.

title: App logout automatically
description: Customer reports being logged out of the app every few minutes.

title: Data not syncing
description: Desktop and mobile apps not showing the same synced data.

title: UI display issue
description: On smaller screens, buttons overlap with text fields in the form.
